/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. Buildings of different architectural styles flank the street, their facades reflecting the city's rich history and modern development. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the urban landscape.
